gui

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.GUI

  • public class GUI
extends java.lang.Object
    The graphical user interface to manage resources and control the server.
    Author:
    Clement Gautrais, Paul Chaignon

        Build the option shell. The window allow the user to change the settings.

      • addResourceItem

      • removeResourceItem

        static void removeResourceItem(Resource resource)

      • enableResources

        static void enableResources()
        Enable the resources selected. Update the resources table.

      • disableResources

        static void disableResources()
        Disable the resources selected. Update the resources table.

      • removeResources

        static void removeResources()
        Remove the resources selected in the resources table after a quick confirmation from the user. Update the resources table.

      • buildAddShell

        static void buildAddShell()
        Build the window to add a new resource. Simply a small form.

      • buildEditShell

        static void buildEditShell(Resource resource)
        Build the edition window. Simply the same form than in the add window but with the information. The URI field can't be changed.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource to be editing.

        Main method.
